stats.visibility_hint: Multiple host traffic becomes visible when SPAN port is configured

arp_spoof.name: ARP Spoof Detection
arp_spoof.description: Detects ARP spoofing and Gratuitous ARP floods. Monitors MAC-IP mapping changes to identify Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attacks.

gratuitous_window_seconds.label: Gratuitous ARP Window (s)
gratuitous_window_seconds.description: Sliding window length for aggregating Gratuitous ARP packets.

gratuitous_threshold.label: Gratuitous ARP Threshold
gratuitous_threshold.description: Alert triggered when Gratuitous ARP count exceeds this value within the window.

cooldown_seconds.label: Re-alert Cooldown (s)
cooldown_seconds.description: Wait time before re-sending an alert for the same host.

max_tracked_hosts.label: Max Tracked Hosts
max_tracked_hosts.description: Maximum size of the ARP table maintained in memory.

spoof_detected.title: ARP Spoofing Detected
spoof_detected.description: IP {{source_ip}} was associated with MAC {{original_mac}}, but now claims to be MAC {{source_mac}}. Possible ARP cache poisoning attack.

gratuitous_flood.title: Gratuitous ARP Flood
gratuitous_flood.description: MAC {{source_mac}} (IP {{source_ip}}) sent {{count}}+ gratuitous ARP replies in {{window_seconds}}s. Possible ARP spoofing preparation.

reasoning.spoof: MAC address change detected for the same IP → Possible ARP cache poisoning
reasoning.flood: Sent {{count}} gratuitous ARP replies → Possible spoofing preparation

dhcp_spoof.name: DHCP Spoof Detection
dhcp_spoof.description: Detects rogue DHCP servers. Prevents attackers from manipulating network settings via forged DHCP responses.

starvation_threshold.label: DHCP Starvation Threshold
starvation_threshold.description: Alert triggered when DHCP DISCOVER packet count exceeds this value within the window.

starvation_window_seconds.label: Starvation Window (s)
starvation_window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating DHCP starvation activity.

known_servers.label: Known DHCP Servers
known_servers.description: List of trusted DHCP server IP addresses. Auto-learns if empty.

rogue_server.title: Rogue DHCP Server Detected
rogue_server.description: DHCP response from unknown server {{source_ip}} (MAC: {{source_mac}}). Potential Rogue DHCP attack.

starvation.title: DHCP Starvation Attack Detected
starvation.description: Bursts of DHCP DISCOVER packets from {{count}} unique MACs. Potential IP resource exhaustion attempt.

mac_spoof.name: MAC Spoof Detection
mac_spoof.description: Detects MAC address forgery. Identifies OUI mismatches, random MACs, and multiple IP usage on a single MAC.

max_ips_per_mac.label: Max IPs per MAC
max_ips_per_mac.description: Suspected cloning if a single MAC uses more than this many unique IPs within the window.

ip_window_seconds.label: IP Tracking Window (s)
ip_window_seconds.description: Time window for tracking MAC-IP bindings.

max_tracked_macs.label: Max Tracked MACs
max_tracked_macs.description: Maximum size of the MAC tracking table in memory.

local_admin.title: Locally Administered MAC Detected
local_admin.description: MAC {{source_mac}} has the locally administered bit set but is not from a known virtualization vendor. Potential forgery.

cloning.title: Possible MAC Cloning
cloning.description: MAC {{source_mac}} associated with {{count}} unique IPs in {{window_seconds}}s. Potential MAC address cloning attack.

port_scan.name: Port Scan Detection
port_scan.description: Detects port scanning activity. Identifies scanners and attackers probing multiple ports in a short duration.

threshold.label: Port Scan Threshold
threshold.description: Alert triggered when unique destination port count exceeds this value within the window.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating port scan activity.

stealth_threshold.label: Stealth Scan Threshold
stealth_threshold.description: Warning triggered when abnormal TCP flag packets exceed this count.

stealth.title: Stealth Port Scan Detected
stealth.description: Abnormal TCP flags ({{flags}}) observed from {{source_ip}}. Potential firewall evasion scan.

scan.title: Port Scan Detected
scan.description: {{source_ip}} scanned {{count}} unique ports in {{window_seconds}}s. Potential reconnaissance.

icmp_anomaly.name: ICMP Anomaly Detection
icmp_anomaly.description: Detects anomalies in ICMP traffic. Monitors Ping Sweeps, ICMP Floods, and uncommon ICMP types.

sweep_threshold.label: Ping Sweep Threshold
sweep_threshold.description: Alert triggered when unique host count receiving ICMP Echo Requests exceeds this value.

flood_threshold.label: ICMP Flood Threshold
flood_threshold.description: Alert triggered when ICMP packet rate per second exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating ICMP anomalies.

suspicious_type.title: Suspicious ICMP Type Detected
suspicious_type.description: Uncommon ICMP type {{icmp_type}} sent from {{source_ip}} to {{dest_ip}}. Potential tunneling attempt.

sweep.title: Ping Sweep Detected
sweep.description: {{source_ip}} sent ICMP Echo Requests to {{count}} unique hosts in {{window_seconds}}s.

flood.title: ICMP Flood Detected
flood.description: High ICMP packet rate ({{pps}}/s) from {{source_ip}} to {{dest_ip}}. Potential DoS attack.

protocol_anomaly.name: Protocol Anomaly Detection
protocol_anomaly.description: Detects packets deviating from protocol specifications. Identifies TTL tampering, abnormal TCP flags, and evasion attempts.

min_ttl.label: Min TTL
min_ttl.description: Suspected tampering if packet TTL is less than this value.

detect_reserved_bits.label: Check Reserved Bits
detect_reserved_bits.description: Monitors if reserved bits in IP/TCP headers are set.

low_ttl.title: Abnormally Low TTL Detected
low_ttl.description: Packet TTL from {{source_ip}} is unusually low ({{ttl}}). Potential routing manipulation or evasion attempt.

bogus_flags.title: Bogus TCP Flags (SYN+FIN)
bogus_flags.description: Illegal TCP packet with both SYN and FIN flags set received from {{source_ip}}.

reserved_bit.title: IP Reserved Bit Set
reserved_bit.description: Packet with IP Reserved bit set received from {{source_ip}}. Suspected use of specialized scanners.

dns_anomaly.name: DNS Anomaly Detection
dns_anomaly.description: Detects DNS query anomalies. Identifies random domains (DGA), DNS tunneling, and massive queries.

entropy_threshold.label: Entropy Threshold
entropy_threshold.description: Suspected DGA if domain label randomness exceeds this value.

label_length_threshold.label: Max Label Length
label_length_threshold.description: Suspected tunneling if a DNS label exceeds this length.

query_rate_threshold.label: Query Rate Threshold
query_rate_threshold.description: Alert triggered when DNS query count per second exceeds this value.

tunneling.title: Potential DNS Tunneling
tunneling.description: Query with abnormally long DNS label ('{{qname}}') observed from {{source_ip}}.

dga.title: Potential DGA Domain
dga.description: {{source_ip}} queried a high-entropy domain '{{qname}}'. Potential malware C2 communication.

dns_response.name: DNS Response Analysis
dns_response.description: Analyzes DNS responses. Identifies NXDOMAIN bursts (DGA indicator) and Fast-flux botnet signs.

nxdomain_threshold.label: NXDOMAIN Threshold
nxdomain_threshold.description: Suspected DGA activity if NXDOMAIN response count exceeds this value.

fastflux_threshold.label: Fast-flux IP Threshold
fastflux_threshold.description: Suspected Fast-flux if unique IP count for a single domain exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating DNS response activity.

nxdomain_burst.title: DNS NXDOMAIN Burst
nxdomain_burst.description: Client {{source_ip}} received {{nx_count}} NXDOMAIN responses in a short duration. Suspected DGA scanning.

fast_flux.title: Potential Fast-flux Domain
fast_flux.description: Domain '{{domain}}' resolved to {{ip_count}} unique IPs in a short duration. Suspected botnet.

http_suspicious.name: HTTP Anomaly Detection
http_suspicious.description: Detects HTTP traffic anomalies. Identifies security scanners and C2 beacon communication patterns.

beacon_threshold.label: Beacon Access Count
beacon_threshold.description: Suspected beaconing if regular connections exceed this count.

max_jitter_pct.label: Max Jitter Deviation
max_jitter_pct.description: Considered regular beaconing if interval standard deviation is within this ratio.

scanner.title: Security Scanner Detected
scanner.description: Host {{source_ip}} is using a known security scanner ({{user_agent}}).

beacon.title: HTTP Beaconing Detected
beacon.description: Host {{source_ip}} is regularly connecting to '{{host}}' every {{avg_interval}}s. Potential C2 communication.

traffic_anomaly.name: Traffic Volume Anomaly
traffic_anomaly.description: Detects statistical anomalies in traffic volume and the appearance of new devices.

zscore_threshold.label: Z-score Threshold
zscore_threshold.description: Considered an anomaly if traffic deviation exceeds this multiple of standard deviation.

window_seconds.label: Aggregation Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time unit for calculating traffic volume.

min_data_points.label: Min Data Points
min_data_points.description: Minimum observations required for statistical analysis.

new_device.title: New Network Device Detected
new_device.description: A device with a new MAC address {{source_mac}} (IP: {{source_ip}}) was observed for the first time.

volume.title: Traffic Spike Detected
volume.description: {{packets}} packets observed in {{window_seconds}}s (Z-score: {{z_score}}). Traffic is higher than usual.

data_exfil.name: Data Exfiltration Detection
data_exfil.description: Detects data exfiltration activity. Monitors massive outbound transfers and abnormal upload ratios.

outbound_threshold_mb.label: Outbound Threshold (MB)
outbound_threshold_mb.description: Suspected exfiltration if data sent to external IPs exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Aggregation Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time unit for summing transfer volume.

massive_transfer.title: Massive Data Exfiltration Detected
massive_transfer.description: Host {{source_ip}} sent {{megabytes}} MB to external IP {{dest_ip}} in {{window_seconds}}s.

lateral_movement.name: Lateral Movement Detection
lateral_movement.description: Detects lateral movement activity. Identifies sensitive port access and attack propagation signs.

access_threshold.label: Sensitive Access Threshold
access_threshold.description: Suspected lateral movement if access to unique internal servers exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating internal access activity.

lateral_move.title: Internal Lateral Movement Detected
lateral_move.description: Host {{source_ip}} accessed {{target_count}} internal server sensitive ports in a short duration.

ransomware_lateral.name: Ransomware Lateral Detection
ransomware_lateral.description: Detects ransomware lateral movement. Monitors SMB/RDP brute force and unauthorized honeypot access.

brute_force_threshold.label: Brute Force Threshold
brute_force_threshold.description: Considered brute force if connection attempts to a single host exceed this value.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating propagation activity.

honeypot_ips.label: Honeypot IP List
honeypot_ips.description: List of inactive IP addresses to monitor for unauthorized access.

honeypot.title: Honeypot Access Detected
honeypot.description: Host {{source_ip}} attempted to access inactive honeypot IP {{dest_ip}} on port {{port}}.

brute_force.title: {{service}} Brute Force Detected
brute_force.description: Host {{source_ip}} attempted {{count}} {{service}} connections to {{dest_ip}} in a short duration.

threat_intel.name: Threat Intelligence
threat_intel.description: Matches real-time traffic against external threat feeds. Identifies communication with known malicious IPs and domains.

ip_match.title: Threat IP Communication Detected
ip_match.description: Communication with known malicious IP {{matched_ip}} detected (Source: {{feed_source}}).

domain_match.title: Threat Domain Query Detected
domain_match.description: DNS query for known malicious domain '{{domain}}' detected (Source: {{feed_source}}).

signature.name: Signature Detection
signature.description: Performs signature-based detection. Uses YARA rules and custom patterns to identify known threats.

enable_yara.label: Enable YARA
enable_yara.description: Performs precise pattern matching using the YARA engine.

yara_match.title: YARA Signature Match
yara_match.description: Packet payload matched YARA rules ({{rules}}). Suspected use of malicious tools.

tls_fingerprint.name: TLS Fingerprint Analysis
tls_fingerprint.description: Analyzes TLS handshakes. Detects known malicious clients, self-signed certificates, and suspicious settings.

check_sni.label: SNI Check
check_sni.description: Matches TLS SNI fields against domain blocklists.

check_cert.label: Certificate Check
check_cert.description: Analyzes TLS certificate validity and security.

detect_tunnels.label: TLS Tunnel Detection
detect_tunnels.description: Detects VPN/tunnel usage via traffic patterns.

tunnel_min_packets.label: Min Packets
tunnel_min_packets.description: Minimum samples required for tunnel analysis.

ja3_match.title: Malicious TLS JA3 Detected
ja3_match.description: TLS ClientHello matches known malware JA3 ({{ja3_hash}}, malware: {{malware}}).

ja4_match.title: Malicious TLS JA4 Detected
ja4_match.description: TLS ClientHello matches known malware JA4 ({{ja4_hash}}, malware: {{malware}}).

sni_blocked.title: Blocklisted Domain TLS Access
sni_blocked.description: TLS handshake to known malicious domain {{sni}} detected.

protocol_inspect.name: Deep Protocol Inspection
protocol_inspect.description: Performs Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) on application protocols. Identifies plaintext password exposure and abnormal usage.

detect_plain_auth.label: Plain Auth Detection
detect_plain_auth.description: Monitors unencrypted credential transmission in FTP, SMTP, etc.

plain_auth.title: Plaintext Authentication Exposure
plain_auth.description: Host {{source_ip}} is transmitting unencrypted credentials via port {{port}}.

suspicious_file.title: Suspicious File Request (HTTP)
suspicious_file.description: Host {{source_ip}} requested an executable file (.{{extension}}) via HTTP.

flow_port_scan.name: Port Scan (NetFlow)
flow_port_scan.description: Detects port scanning based on NetFlow data. Used as an alternative in environments without SPAN ports.

threshold.label: Port Scan Threshold
threshold.description: Alert triggered when unique destination port count exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Detection Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time window for aggregating port scan activity.

scan.title: Port Scan Detected (NetFlow)
scan.description: Host {{source_ip}} scanned {{unique_ports}} ports over NetFlow in {{window_seconds}}s.

flow_data_exfil.name: Data Exfiltration (NetFlow)
flow_data_exfil.description: Detects data exfiltration based on NetFlow data. Identifies massive transfer activity to external IPs.

outbound_threshold_mb.label: Outbound Threshold (MB)
outbound_threshold_mb.description: Suspected exfiltration if data sent to external IPs exceeds this value.

window_seconds.label: Aggregation Window (s)
window_seconds.description: Time unit for summing transfer volume.

massive_transfer.title: Massive Data Exfiltration (NetFlow)
massive_transfer.description: Host {{source_ip}} sent {{megabytes}} MB to external IP {{dest_ip}} over NetFlow.
